comment.author: 92019063@N00
comment._content: This is a great set of artistic and documentary photographs. Thank you for posting all these views here for all of us to enjoy !

comment.author: 82609930@N06
comment._content:
This is Carol M. Highsmith.  I enjoyed documenting all of the architectural views of the Thomas Jefferson Building for the Library of Congress Prints and Photographs Division.
Notice on this image, the flame at the top.  I witnessed the artesian apply the gold leaf to the flame during the restoration process.  There is no detail that was left undone.  This is the most beautiful building in America!
